column3:
Sure ... but not by creating random pull requests. Check out the doc/translation_process.md file, especially the bit about transifex. Looks like we could do with some help with the Portuguese translation.

https://www.transifex.com/projects/p/bitcoin/resource/tx/

Yes, you can translate at @robbak's link.

Why create a a random pull request?

Hello, I propose my help for Spanish translation.

I'm part of a team devoted to promote BitCoin in spanish language.
Studying your work and maybe i'll be capable of debuggin in near future.

Happy 2014.
